text: "When I Get Where I'm Going" is a song and recorded by American country music artist Brad Paisley. It was released in October 2005 as second single from his album Time Well Wasted. ==Music video== It premiered on CMT on December 8, 2005. It debuted at number 20 on CMT's Top 20 Countdown for the week of January 19, 2006. The video peaked at number 1 on CMT's Top Twenty Countdown for two consecutive weeks in April 2006. ==References== Category:2005 songs
title: When I Get Where I'm Going
